title: Smart Data Models - PowerSystemResource
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A power system resource can be an item of equipment such as a switch, an equipment container containing many individual items of equipment such as a substation, or an organisational entity such as sub-control area. Power system resources can have measurements associated.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PowerSystemResource

Controls.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Regulating device governed by this control output. Default: 'list'

Location.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Location of this power system resource. Default: None

Measurements.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The power system resource that contains the measurement. Default: 'list'
